description: Try our easy to follow Pad Thai recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pad Thai Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 limes, juiced (plus 2 lime wedges to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Put noodles in a large bowl. Cover with hot water and stand until softened and white. Drain and rinse under cold water. Set aside.
Combine chilli sauce, lime juice, fish sauce and brown sugar in a bowl.
Heat a wok or large non-stick frying pan or wok over high heat. Add a little of the oil and cook chicken strips in batches until lightly browned. Remove from wok and set aside.
Heat remaining oil. Stir-fry shallots for 1 minute.
Add drained noodles to wok and stir until well combined. Add sauce mixture. Toss until well combined then add egg tossing through all ingredients.
Return chicken to wok with bean sprouts and cook for 1-2 minutes or until just heated through.
Sprinkle with peanuts, coriander leaves and slices of chilli.
